reality_check.description: To keep track of your betting, a Reality Check tells you when you’ve logged in for a specified amount of time.

easter_heist.coin_bonus_push_to_start: Push Spin to start Gold Eggs Respin bonus

paytable.wild_desc: Substitutes all symbols in the winning line except for Scatter and Gold Eggs.
paytable.scatter_desc: 3 Scatters on reels 1-3-5 trigger 10 Free Spins. If during the Free Spins round Scatters fall out on the reels 10 Free Spins are additionally awarded
paytable.coin_desc: 6 and more Gold Eggs fell out on the reels trigger Gold Eggs Respin. The more Gold Eggs drop on the reels during the Bonus round the greater will be the win. The possible Gold Egg value can be x1, x2, x3, x4, x5, x6, x7, x8, x10, x14, x16, x18, x20 of the bet.
paytable.collect_coin_desc: Appears in the Gold Eggs Respin Feature. Sums up the values of all Gold Eggs present on the screen.
paytable.coin_respin_desc: 6 and more Gold Eggs fell out on the reels trigger Gold Eggs Respin. The more Gold Eggs drop on the reels during the Bonus round the greater will be the win. The possible Gold Egg value can be x1, x2, x3, x4, x5, x6, x7, x8, x10, x14, x16, x18, x20 of the bet. Initial Bonus round includes 6 respins. If a “Plus spin” symbol drops on the reels during the Bonus round one additional spin is awarded. If during one spin more than one “Plus spin” symbols drop, the number of additional spin is summarized. All the Gold Eggs stay on the reels till the end of the Bonus round.
paytable.jackpot_desc: A player can win a Jackpot (x5000) in the Gold Eggs Respin feature. It is won if 15 positions on the reels are filled with а symbols.
paytable.plus_spin_desc: Appears in the Gold Eggs Respin feature. Adds 1 additional respin to the round. If more than 1 “Plus spin” symbol drop on the reels, additional respins are summed up.
paytable.free_spins_desc: 3 Scatters on reels 1-3-5 trigger 10 Free Spins. If during the Free Spins round Scatters fall out on the reels 10 Free Spins are additionally awarded.
